title: 换个名字就显示这样了
author: SHIKONGJIAN
txt_content:
[16:10:07] [Client thread/INFO]: [net.minecraft.client.Minecraft:func_71377_b:359]: #@!@# Game crashed! Crash report saved to: #@!@# C:\Users\user\Desktop\科技魔法生存\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2019-01-11_16.10.06-client.txt
Exception in thread "Thread-14"

replies.author: 泠绮芜
replies.txt_content:
我没法编辑帖子了
是指mod换名吗？如果是，那么有些mod就不可以，比如僵尸意识
或者是文件夹名字含有非法字符

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
这个发上来
C:\Users\user\Desktop\科技魔法生存\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2019-01-11_16.10.06-client.txt

replies.author: SHIKONGJIAN
replies.txt_content: 离线登录时换个名字就不行了

replies.author: SHIKONGJIAN
replies.txt_content:
crash-2019-01-11_16.10.06-client.txt
(30.14 KB, 下载次数: 4)



2019-1-13 12:59 上传
点击文件名下载附件

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
SHIKONGJIAN 发表于 2019-1-13 12:59
出错的mod是 YukariLib-1.7.10-1.2.2.jar

这个mod似乎会检查你是否为正版，如果是离线登陆就拒绝启动。

c6h2cl2.YukariLib.PlayerNotOfficialPurchasedException: You must buy Minecraft from Official Site!!!复制代码
